questions: Is there a shrub in the scene?
Is the shrub short in shape?
Is there a paperweight in the scene?
Is the paperweight in the shape of a pyramid?
model_output:
yes There is a green shrub present in the scene.
yes The shrub has a compact and short form compared to its width.
yes A pyramidal object in front of the shrub appears to function as a paperweight due to its size and material.
yes The paperweight clearly exhibits a pyramidal geometric shape.
yes The reflective surface of the pyramidal object suggests it is metallic.
